title: The unreasonableness and impiety of popery: in a second letter written upon the discovery of the late plot..
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
publisher: Printed for R. Chiswell, at the sign of the Rose and Crown in St. Paul's Church-yard,,
